content.heading: Who We Are
content.body: PropYouLike is a RERA-registered real estate marketing partner based in Bengaluru. We help homebuyers discover verified residential projects with transparency, clarity, and guided site visits.

content.heading: What We Do
content.body: We assist buyers with project information, pricing insights, site visit coordination, and communication with developers. Our services are completely free for homebuyers.

content.heading: Our Relationship With Developers
content.body: PropYouLike works as an official channel partner for select developers. We are not the developer, promoter, or owner of any project listed on this website.
